text: b'@PresidencyZA thanks to all those who sent constructive suggestions on issues to address for #SONA2015'
b'Promoting a caring society as a guest of the Evangelical... in Giyani, Limpopo'
b"Happy Grandparents' day to all grandparents in SA.Let us continue to protect and give them the special attention they deserve."
b'teaching as you hold the future of our country in your hands.'
b'On World Teachers Day, I urge all teachers to rededicate and recommit themselves to quality learning and'
b'Our whole nation supports the Springboks this afternoon as they face old rivals, the All Blacks at Ellis Park! Go Bokke!!'
b'Support Child Protection Week this week by committing to protect our children.'
b'Africa is rising! Our time has indeed come. Happy Africa Day to all!'
b'Over the last decade, six of the world\xe2\x80\x99s ten fastest growing economies were in Africa.'
b'Let us celebrate the Jubilee by promoting peace, unity, dignity and prosperity in our beloved continent! Happy Africa Day to all!'
b'Today marks the 50th anniversary of the Organisation of African Unity.'
b'Congrats to Africa\xe2\x80\x99s newest Head of State, HE Uhuru Kenyatta of Kenya, looking forward to further growing ties between our two nations!'
b'Happy 70th birthday to my friend President Guebuza!Have many more!'
b"I ve just arrived in Kimberely at the house of Northern Cape Premier Hazel Jenkins to check how she's recovering after she fell ill"
b'Thanks for your contributions to the SONA, I have already identified some issues that I agree need immediate attention Keep them coming'
b"It feels good to be here in Mangaung.  I wouldn't have it any other way.  The ANC is great."
b'The overwhelming sense of pride is with us as I arrive to join masses and leaders of the ANC in Mangaung ahead of the centenary celebrations'
b'Wonderful listening to the concerns of fellow South Africans on Tuesday. Today I take some of those concerns to the leaders of BRICS & #G20'
b'During this auspicious time we wish the Hindu, Tamil, Gujerati & other communities a Happy #Diwali & a prosperous New Year!'
b'I urge all South Africans and all who reside in our country, to avail themselves to be counted. #Census2011  http://t.co/cvODB5fm'
b'#Census2011 From 10-31 October government will send people to your homes to count members of households to help us plan for a better future'
b'I would like to wish Archbishop Desmond #Tutu a hearty birthday & a long healthy life Happy Birthday Arch, ukuhle njalo http://t.co/v9pis9nY'
b'Please nominate the hero or heroine of your choice for the South African National Orders. http://t.co/2ttUjnqG #nationalorders'
b'Just finished my monitoring visit to Eastern Cape, reporting to Madiba now in Qunu! Always a pleasure to see him!'
b'We join the Muslim community in celebrating the end of Ramadan & wish them a happy Eid-ul-Fitr! May you have a peaceful & joyous Eid Mubarak'
b'Wonderful meeting the #Springboks Rugby team this morning. Let us all unite behind the #Bokke @bokrugby  http://t.co/YMBDJlq'
b'Looking forward to attending SARS Amakhwezi Awards tonight, where we honour top performing public servants..working together we can do more!'
b'Today we honour the contribution of women to making South Africa a thriving non-sexist, non-racial & prosperous democracy. Happy #WomensDay'
b'Meeting media owners to discuss New Growth Path, media development & diversity, promotion of Brand SA & government marketing. #MediaSummit'
b'On behalf of the government and people of South Africa we wish the Muslim community well over the fast of Ramadan. http://t.co/jN0OHJ2'
b'...to finalise our service delivery, infrastructure & employment creation projects & plans'
b'We welcomed Premiers & local govt representatives today at the Cabinet lekgotla, who have joined Ministers & Deputy Ministers on day 3...'
b'Happy birthday to my friend, colleague, brother and comrade, Deputy President Kgalema Motlanthe! Have many many more!  http://t.co/MB3COjH'
b'...ending the day with a courtesy call on #Madiba In Qunu. Happy birthday Tata! #MandelaDay'
b'I look forward to fruitful talks with Prime Minister Cameron, and later the launch of the ANC 1million membership campaign at Rivonia...'
b"I encourage you all to tune into channel 107   Tonight on dstv at 7pm for a new sitcom 'it's for life' it promises to be great #itsforlife"
b'We are discussing improvements to provincial health care. Wishing the royal couple all the best!'
b'I will unfortunately miss wedding reception of HSH Prince Albert & Princess Charlene. Still meeting Limpopo Provincial EXCO in Lebowakgomo'
b'My Ministers & I are currently visiting health facilities in Limpopo province as part of our Monitoring and Evaluation Site Visits programme'
b'Just touched down in Durban. Looking forward to welcoming the members of the IOC for the 123rd Session being held in Durban this week.'
b'We are pleased to welcome the Olympic movement to South Africa for the first IOC Session to be held on the continent. http://t.co/wRzvksF'
b'We welcome them to Durban, South Africa next week during the 123rd Session of the International Olympic Committee #Monacowedding'
b'Congratulations to HSH Prince Albert and HSH Princess Charlene of Monaco on their nuptials. #monacowedding'
b'Just arrived from the African Union Summit in Equatorial Guinea. Glad to be back in Mzansi.'
b'The backlog is enormous but we have a good plan. http://t.co/bDfAC03'
b'The primary school national assessment results show we must work harder than ever together to improve education. http://t.co/bDfAC03'
b'On my way to Equatorial Guinea to attend the African Union Summit. We need more Africa-owned and Africa-led solutions to our problems.'
b'I am taking a few days off to rest and enjoy watching the sun rise and set without rushing anywhere, till Saturday.'
b'Unfortunately unable to join rally in Beaufort West as ash cloud has grounded plane. Apologies to those who made the trip to the stadium.'
b'On this #FathersDay take responsibility for your children. Be that superhero. Happy #FathersDay'
b'#FathersDay He is the first male role-model a child encounters. His behaviour determines their relationship with other male figures.'
b'Happy #FathersDay. For many children, their father is their first superhero. He protects, guides and inspires a child.'
b'On #YouthDay let us honour the generation of 1976 by taking advantage of the economic opportunities that our democracy has blessed us with.'
b'RT @PresidencyZA: #BVoteZuma Citizens must have access to affordable universal basic services such as water, housing, electricity & othe ...'
b"RT @PresidencyZA: #BVoteZuma Transcript of President Jacob Zuma's Presidency Budget Vote address http://t.co/yhcDTJm"
b"#BVoteZuma On my way to Parliament to present the Presidency Budget Vote detailing the Presidency's plans & achievements over the past year"
b'One of the most steadfast, dignified and disciplined pillars of our struggle has fallen, an era has ended. Hamba kahle Mama #Sisulu'
b'RT @PresidencyZA: Ms Asanda Nginda of the Representative Council for Learners of Sobantu High School addresses President Zuma #PME http: ...'
b"Addressing combined audience of learners and parents at Sobantu High School in Peddie, Nobumba near King William's Town http://t.co/1FDrg3x"
b'RT @PresidencyZA: #PME Children at Sobantu High School await arrival of President Zuma. It is the last school that he will visit http:// ...'
b'Learning conditions at Vulumzi are not ideal, but parents, teachers & education authorities are doing their best to improve education. #PME'
b'RT @PresidencyZA: #PME President Zuma addressing pupils, teachers and parents at Vulumzi Junior Primary school http://twitpic.com/5859s0'
b'In the Eastern Cape today, undertaking a Monitoring & Evaluation visit linked to 5 government priorities, focusing today on Education. #PME'
b'Working together we can make South Africa a better place by embracing the #MandelaMondays initiative. Change the world around you!'
b'Let us rally behind #BafanaBafana in their match against Egypt tonight!'
b'Paying my last respects to Mrs Johanna Cecilia du Plessis this afternoon. http://t.co/oUIj5ZR'
b'I have granted the late Mama Albertina #Sisulu an Official Funeral & instructed National Flags be flown at half-mast http://t.co/mW6nzW3'
b'RT@PresidencyZA: Mama #Sisulu has been pillar of strength not only for Sisulu family but also entire liberation movement http://t.co/9MUHXhB'
b'Mama #Sisulu was one of the foremost mothers of the nation and the last of the colossuses of the struggle for the liberation of South Africa'
b'On behalf of the Government and people of South Africa, we would like to convey our deepest condolences to the #Sisulu family'
b'Today is the 100 day countdown to the start of the Rugby World Cup. Let us wear our green and gold every Friday in support of the Bokke #RWC'
b"June 1st marks International Children's Day. Let us work together to care for our little ones and keep them safe from harm. #ChildrensDay"
b'I was encouraged by the cooperative manner of the Libyan authorities. #AntonHammerl http://t.co/z2Tfd9E'
b'The South African government will work with the Hammerl family to discuss proposals made by the Libyan authorities. http://t.co/z2Tfd9E'
b'I have raised the issue of Anton Hammerl with Libyan leader Col Muammar Gadaffi. The authorities undertook to assist in finding his remains.'
b'My well wishes to those participating in the #Comrades Marathon. You inspire us to lead healthy and active lives and to reach for our dreams'
b'My well wishes go out to those participating in the ultimate human race, the #Comrades Marathon, tomorrow. You inspire us all!'
b'We will do whatever possible to assist the family of Anton Hammerl. http://t.co/JMlUN1d'
b'We will do whatever is possible to assist while in Tripoli. The Department of International Relations also continues to work on this matter.'
b'We extend our heartfelt condolences to Mr Hammerl\xe2\x80\x99s wife Penny Sukhraj & children Aurora, Neo & Hiro as well as his parents Freda & Ludwig.'
b'I have received a letter from the family of former photographer Anton Hammerl who was killed in the line of duty.'
b'We join all Africans on the continent and in the Diaspora in wishing them a #happyafricaday. Let us work together towards an African century'
b"We need to do more to market and tell South African success stories, including those of it's maturing  democracy."
b'I am happy with the work of the International Marketing Council after meeting its Board today.'
b'President Mandela is spending some time resting at Qunu. Thanks to all for love, respect and privacy.'
b'The next step is for people to use their hard won right to vote to by participating in ward committees...  http://t.co/C2fTaoR'
b'Now that the fierce campaigning & competition for votes has ended, it is time for political parties to begin working together. mzan.si/hWHH'
b'U are accountable to people who voted for U and those who did not vote for U because councillors must serve all South African people equally'
b'Our people have declared their will through the ballot box, and ours is to obey and fulfil their wishes.'
b'This is good for our democracy.it is also a good way to defend our freedom!Prez Zuma.'
b'I would like to thank all voters who came out in numbers to voete.'
b'I feel very good about the election results. It has certainly brought many lessons to many of  us.Prez Zuma'
b'Congratulations to all for a peaceful election campaign nationwide. Our democracy is maturing in only 17 years.'
b'#SApolls I will vote in Nkandla at 11am. Always a liberating experience! #LGE2011'
b"Today, on Walter Sisulu's birthday, go out in your millions and vote for a better life for all! #SApolls #LGE2011"
b"I have just visited IEC HQ centre. I'm satisfied with preparations and I would like to congratulate the IEC's officials for a good job!"
b'Getting ready for #Siyanqoba. Join me at FNB Stadium in Johannesburg today! Or watch us live on SABC2 from 10am!'
b"I'm off to PE, the friendly city, will spend the whole day with the friendly people of ibhayi elembathwa ngabalaziyo!"
b'Productive day sharing ideas with communities in tackling community concerns in Greytown and Estcourt. Working together we are doing more!'
b"Democracy is flourishing in South Africa, thanks to the active participation of all citizens. It's wonderful. Vote 18 May!"
